thought: To craft a quartz pillar, I need to make two quartz blocks. To make a quartz block, I need to place four pieces of quartz in a square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one piece of quartz to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
